qas.question: What Olympic Sport did Hrant Shahinyan compete in?
What medals did Hrant Shahinyan win at the 1952 Summer Olympics?
Where were the 1952 Summer Olympics held?
What year did Armenia begin competiting in the Olympics seperate from the USSR?

context: Prior to <a3_0>1992<a3_0/>, Armenians would participate in the Olympics representing the USSR. As part of the Soviet Union, Armenia was very successful, winning plenty of medals and helping the USSR win the medal standings at the Olympics on numerous occasions. The first medal won by an Armenian in modern Olympic history was by Hrant Shahinyan (sometimes spelled as Grant Shaginyan), who won <a1_0>two golds and two silvers<a1_0/> in <a0_0>gymnastics<a0_0/> at the 1952 Summer Olympics in <a2_0>Helsinki<a2_0/>.
